 DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE ()

Detailed Description

Represents an icon located in the system tray.

This class is subclassed to add popup functionality when the user right clicks the icon.

Member Function Documentation

wxMenu * TrayIcon::CreatePopupMenu (  ) 

Overrides the wxTaskbarIcon::CreatePopupMenu method to return a menu which the user on a right click event.

Currently returns whatever is in the File menu from the MainWindow but without the accelerator codes.

Returns:
the popup menu to show to the user on right click.

void TrayIcon::OnMenu ( wxCommandEvent &  evt  ) 

Handles a menu event, passing it directly to the main window (which handles the menu events since the menu items are directly from its File menu).
